title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Have this board and first it was L3404 and bad airport card ( in display). CHanged both and it work for 5 minutes. Thans burn L3404 again. CHanges L3404 again ( 3 times for now) and also Q3450 but every time i boot mac coil is burning.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Did you try known good working airport card?

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Yes, but even with card conector disconected it is burning

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Post diode mode to ground at both pins of L3404; w/ and w/o J3401 connected.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message:
Will do it tomorrow. 

today Barcelona is in fire :S

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: In Both cases tester is beeping and 0

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: If L3404 gets burnt, then short at C3422, or J3401.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: changed both, C3422 and J3401, continue burning.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Lift L3404, where remains the short?

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: There is no short now. But in diode mode (red to ground) both pins are 0.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: with J3401 connected shor on pin 2. So is it cable?

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message:
Or airport card.
Disconnect the other end of cable and see if short is gone.

"There is no short now. But in diode mode (red to ground) both pins are 0."
I cannot really understand this...

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message: Wit airport disconected still shorted. Changed whole flex from camera and airport to logic board, Changed L3404 again. Before boot checked and with cable conected there were no short on pin 2. Once connected L3404 burn again and short appear like previous cable. If connected J3401 short is present, if not, not present.

title: 820-2530 no wifi.
message:
Cover connector pins from MLB with kapton tape; or ripp off the black (CONDUCTIVE) sponge!
If still short after, change the cable...
